data.name: Split Drive
data.detailed_description:
Split Drive is a roguelite arena shooter where you have to find your way home through a hostile galaxy, numerous locations and a variety of bosses, all generated procedurally.



After critical failure of the experimental Split Drive engine, you are transported to an unknown part of the galaxy, filled with hostile enemy ships. You must find your way home by navigating through space and fighting with the enemy ships using any weapons you can find. Upgrading your ship is vital to your survival.



Each gameplay is different. With the randomly generated galaxy, numerous space locations and a variety of randomly generated bosses, you never know what you will encounter. You must upgrade your ship and equip it with powerful weapons to survive.



Game Features
-Randomly generated galaxy
-Randomly generated locations
-Over 20 ship upgrades to choose from
-Over 16 different super weapons to unlock
-An infinite number of randomly generated bosses
